file_content.text: Jedi, the Council is pleased to see you've arrived on Alderaan.
Until recently, Alderaan was a part of the Republic. Today, it's on the brink of collapse.
Shortly after seceding, both the queen and the heir to the Alderaanian throne were assassinated. A usurper, Bouris Ulgo, stepped into power, setting off a civil war.
Sounds like a rough place to be. Who am I looking for?
And my mission?
I assume one of the Jedi Masters is here.
Who am I looking for?
Spare me the history lesson--just tell me who I'm supposed to find.
I don't care about Alderaan.
Master Sidonie Garen, one of the Jedi Order's finest strategists and diplomats, dropped out of contact briefly while on Alderaan.
She's made contact since but was evasive about her silence.
Master Sidonie is brokering a peace on Alderaan. If she is suffering from the plague, it could jeopardize the entire peace process.
Do you have any leads on her location?
Where do I start?
I won't let that happen.
Not if I can stop it.
Why must I always be the one to fix these things?
I'm always cleaning up messes.
You are the only one with the ability to shield the plaguemaster's victims.
Master Sidonie was working with the head of House Organa's diplomatic corps, Hallam Organa.
Find Master Sidonie and make sure she is well, that the peace process is not in jeopardy.
